unnormalised: A new initiative aims to introduce LaTeX to students in rural India, starting with pilot programs in schools across Uttar Pradesh. The program, slated to begin on 10/10/2024, focuses on simplifying complex mathematical equations and scientific notations, making them more accessible. Participants will learn to represent equations like $\frac{d}{dx} e^{ax} = ae^{ax}$ or even more complex integrals such as $\int_{0}^{\infty} \frac{\sin x}{x} dx = \frac{\pi}{2}$ with greater clarity and precision.
normalised: A new initiative aims to introduce L-A-T-E-X to students in rural India, starting with pilot programs in schools across Uttar Pradesh. The program, slated to begin on tenth october two thousand and twenty four, focuses on simplifying complex mathematical equations and scientific notations, making them more accessible. Participants will learn to represent equations like the derivative with respect to x of e to the power of a x equals a e to the power of a x or even more complex integrals such as the integral from zero to infinity of sine x over x d x equals pi divided by two with greater clarity and precision.

unnormalised: The workshops, lasting approximately 3 days (72 hrs), will cover basic LaTeX commands and environments, including formatting text, creating tables, and typesetting mathematical expressions. Expert instructors from IIT Kanpur and BHU Varanasi will lead the sessions, ensuring students grasp fundamental concepts like using $$...$$ for inline equations and \[...\] for displayed equations. A special emphasis will be placed on creating matrices represented as $\begin{bmatrix} a & b \\ c & d \end{bmatrix}$ or more elaborate statistical distributions.
normalised: The workshops, lasting approximately three days (seventy two hours), will cover basic L-A-T-E-X commands and environments, including formatting text, creating tables, and typesetting mathematical expressions. Expert instructors from I-I-T Kanpur and B-H-U Varanasi will lead the sessions, ensuring students grasp fundamental concepts like using dollar dollar ellipsis dollar dollar for inline equations and backslash square bracket ellipsis backslash square bracket for displayed equations. A special emphasis will be placed on creating matrices represented as begin B matrix a and b, c and d end B matrix or more elaborate statistical distributions.

unnormalised: The initiative will also address challenges such as limited internet access by providing offline resources, including comprehensive manuals. These materials cover from basic operations up to generating graphs for data of various forms. The program’s success will be measured through post-workshop assessments, where students will be required to typeset various mathematical problems, including solving quadratic equations, showing the Pythagorean theorem a^2+b^2=c^2 and manipulating trigonometric identities.

unnormalised: This initiative not only aims to equip students with essential skills for academic and professional pursuits but also promotes inclusivity by making STEM education more accessible to underprivileged communities. Future expansion plans include incorporating more advanced LaTeX features, potentially covering packages like `amsmath`, `amssymb`, and `tikz` to deal with abstract and geometric objects.
